column2: Potential data loss due to corrupted files/attachments

column1: Serena has five tasks within Archer assigned to her, and she can see all five tasks in a "My Tasks" report on her dashboard. Serena visits her teammate Beth, and peers over her shoulder to see the same dashboard on Beth's screen. Beth's dashboard displays ten tasks, not the five that Serena sees. What is the most likely cause?
column2: Serena's tasks have not reached the same status value as Beth's
column3: Beth's My Tasks report has been modified to include tasks assigned to both Beth and Serena
column4: The report on the dashboard is using a filter on the Assigned To field, that limits the results returned to be only those for whom the user currently logged in can access
column5: Five additional tasks have been assigned during the walk Serena took from her desk to Beth's desk.

column1: Archer records that leverage Advanced Workflow will have an interactive feature that non-Advanced Workflow records do not have. Which of the following best describes this addition to the record?
column2: A Remove icon appears bear the top of the record. Users can either unsubscribe from the workflow for this record, or delete the record entirely
column3: An Actions dropdown menu appears near the top of the record. Users can use this dropdown to advance the record to the next stage of the workflow
column4: An email icon appears near the top of the record. Users can use this icon to quickly notify other users that the record is read to move to the next stage of the workflow
column5: A copy icon appears near the top of the record. Users can use the Copy functionality to replicate the record and send it to multiple users all within the current stage of the workflow
